CodeBlockMethod.Name: StatUP
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
--stat = {1:attack,2:hp,3:skill,4:monster,5:building} stat은 int로 올것
if(self.stat == 0) then --log("nostat") return false elseif(self.stat_table[stat] == 1 and self.Level < 5) then --log("stat2 need lv5") return false elseif(self.stat_table[stat] == 2 and self.Level < 8) then --log("stat3 need lv8") return false elseif(self.stat_table[stat] == 3) then --log("full_stat") return false else if (stat == 1) then self.Entity.PlayerAttack:Change_offence_power(tonumber(_DataService:GetCell("stat",2,self.stat_table[1]+3))) elseif (stat == 2) then self.Entity.Common:Change_MaxHP(tonumber(_DataService:GetCell("stat",1,self.stat_table[2]+3))) elseif (stat == 3) then self.Entity.SkillComponent.lv = self.Entity.SkillComponent.lv + 1 if self.Entity.SkillComponent.lv == 1 then self.Skill_1.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.ImageRUID = "7bc971f7a7f94119a25cdf4ee3a9f63d" -- 배틀킹 바 활성화 self.Skill_1_mob.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.ImageRUID = "7bc971f7a7f94119a25cdf4ee3a9f63d" elseif self.Entity.SkillComponent.lv == 2 then self.Skill_2.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.ImageRUID = "0aadfea3439e4353a227884cd2f73d14" -- 속성스킬 활성화 self.Skill_2_mob.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.ImageRUID = "0aadfea3439e4353a227884cd2f73d14" elseif self.Entity.SkillComponent.lv == 3 then self.Skill_3.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.white -- 귀환 활성화 self.Skill_3_mob.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.white end elseif (stat == 4) then self.Entity.MonsterSummonComponent.lv = self.Entity.MonsterSummonComponent.lv + 1 elseif (stat == 5) then self.Entity.PlayerBuilding.lv = self.Entity.PlayerBuilding.lv + 1 self.Entity.PlayerBuilding:Ban() end self.stat_table[stat] = self.stat_table[stat] + 1 self.stat = self.stat - 1 self.stat_num.TextComponent.Text = "Stat : " ..tostring(math.floor(self.stat)) if self.stat <= 0 then self.Level_btn.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.ImageRUID = "b9ab8455d5737bf4cb21433f00fdc19d" -- 스탯 없으면 반짝임 끄기 end return true end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: GetEXP
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self.EXP = self.EXP + EXP if(self.EXP >= self.EXP_table[math.floor(self.Level)]) then self.EXP = self.EXP - self.EXP_table[math.floor(self.Level)] self.Level = self.Level + 1 self.stat = self.stat + 1 --log("lvUP") self:LevelUp() self:StatUnlock() end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: LevelUp
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if (self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end local Sound = self.Background.SoundComponent if self.Entity.StatComponent.Level > 1 then self.Level_btn.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.ImageRUID = "f56452e2c7464911bd7696e9d36ad8db" -- 반짝이기 local parent = self.Entity local Eff = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId("model://e752cc2d-4e57-4a4d-92fa-2f14cc3013dd","LevelUpEffect",Vector3.zero,parent) Sound.Enable = true wait(2) Eff:Destroy() Sound.Enable = false self:stat_update() end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: StatUnlock
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if(self.Entity == _UserService.LocalPlayer) then if self.Level >= 5 then self.Level5_Lock.Enable = false end
if self.Level >= 8 then self.Level8_Lock.Enable = false end end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: fill_color
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(e.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color ~= color)then e.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = color else self:fill_color(e.Children[1],color) end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local key = event.key -------------------------------------------------------- if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end if(key == KeyboardKey.Alpha1 and self:StatUP(1)) then self:fill_color(self.ATK_UI, Color.red) elseif(key == KeyboardKey.Alpha2 and self:StatUP(2))then self:fill_color(self.HP_UI, Color.blue) elseif(key == KeyboardKey.Alpha3 and self:StatUP(3))then self:fill_color(self.Skill_UI, Color.green) elseif(key == KeyboardKey.Alpha4 and self:StatUP(4))then self:fill_color(self.Monster_UI, Color.magenta) elseif(key == KeyboardKey.Alpha5 and self:StatUP(5))then self:fill_color(self.Build_UI, Color.gray) end
